google_reviews.author: Alberta Garcia
google_reviews.review: Ta was amazing! Our application process took less then 1 week and she was great at communicating. The units look great and the price was fair when compared to other rentals in the area.

google_reviews.author: Simon P
google_reviews.review: Excellent rental property. Manager is awesome and the apartments are well appointed. Very positive stay here.

google_reviews.author: Hayden Anderson
google_reviews.review: Amazing management and very well maintained property. Nice appliances and building materials were used. A little drafty at times but nothing a heater can't fix. Love this place!

google_reviews.author: Stephanie Rasmussen
google_reviews.review: Very friendly manager, beautiful and well-lit apartments, a fenced off-leash area for dogs, and  an indoor heated dog wash station! The two service requests I have had to put in were resolved within 24 hours, even with having to call out an electrician.

google_reviews.author: Julian McAllister
google_reviews.review: Good but it could be better

owner_response.text: Hi Julian. Thank you for your review. Please let me know what I can do to make living here at Cedar Grove better for you. As you know, my door is always open for you and Sharon.

summary.text:
Good

The Cedar Grove Apartments receive many favorable user reviews highlighting the attractive features and generally positive living experience. Many tenants have praised the quality of the apartments, mentioning beautiful designs, nice appliances, and a fair pricing structure compared to other rentals in the area. The management appears to be competent and responsive, with one user noting that their application process went smoothly in less than a week accompanied by clear communication.

Another common theme in user reviews is the overall maintenance of the property. Several reviewers indicated that management promptly addressed service requests, with one resident noting that issues were resolved within 24 hours, even when an electrician was needed. This level of attentiveness helps to foster a pleasant living environment, enhancing residents' overall satisfaction with their choice of Cedar Grove Apartments.

Great

User reviews depict Cedar Grove Apartments as a well-managed property with many amenities that elevate the living experience. Residents have expressed appreciation for unique features like a fenced off-leash area for dogs and an indoor heated dog wash station, showcasing the management's thoughtfulness towards pet owners. Overall, the apartments are described as well-appointed and appealing, contributing to a very positive atmosphere.

Bad

Ugly
